name: session
vimscript:
let SessionLoad = 1
let s:so_save = &g:so | let s:siso_save = &g:siso | setg so=0 siso=0 | setl so=-1 siso=-1
let v:this_session=expand("<sfile>:p")
silent only
silent tabonly
cd ~/code/github/minimal-statusline.nvim
if expand('%') == '' && !&modified && line('$') <= 1 && getline(1) == ''
  let s:wipebuf = bufnr('%')
endif
let s:shortmess_save = &shortmess
if &shortmess =~ 'A'
  set shortmess=aoOA
else
  set shortmess=aoO
endif
badd +26 ~/code/github/minimal-statusline.nvim/lua/minimal-statusline/init.lua
badd +38 ~/code/github/minimal-statusline.nvim/lua/minimal-statusline/utils.lua
badd +29 ~/code/github/minimal-statusline.nvim/lua/minimal-statusline/provider.lua
badd +3 ~/code/github/minimal-statusline.nvim/lua/minimal-statusline/builtins.lua
badd +69 ~/code/github/minimal-statusline.nvim/lua/minimal-statusline/icons.lua
argglobal
%argdel
tabnew +setlocal\ bufhidden=wipe
tabrewind
edit ~/code/github/minimal-statusline.nvim/lua/minimal-statusline/provider.lua
let s:save_splitbelow = &splitbelow
let s:save_splitright = &splitright
set splitbelow splitright
wincmd _ | wincmd |
vsplit
wincmd _ | wincmd |
vsplit
2wincmd h
wincmd w
wincmd w
wincmd _ | wincmd |
split
1wincmd k
wincmd w
let &splitbelow = s:save_splitbelow
let &splitright = s:save_splitright
wincmd t
let s:save_winminheight = &winminheight
let s:save_winminwidth = &winminwidth
set winminheight=0
set winheight=1
set winminwidth=0
set winwidth=1
exe 'vert 1resize ' . ((&columns * 85 + 128) / 256)
exe 'vert 2resize ' . ((&columns * 84 + 128) / 256)
exe '3resize ' . ((&lines * 33 + 34) / 68)
exe 'vert 3resize ' . ((&columns * 85 + 128) / 256)
exe '4resize ' . ((&lines * 32 + 34) / 68)
exe 'vert 4resize ' . ((&columns * 85 + 128) / 256)
argglobal
balt ~/code/github/minimal-statusline.nvim/lua/minimal-statusline/init.lua
let s:cpo_save=&cpo
set cpo&vim
nnoremap <buffer> <silent>  <Cmd>lua vim.lsp.buf.definition()
nnoremap <buffer> <silent> ,ca <Cmd>lua vim.lsp.buf.code_action()
nnoremap <buffer> <silent> ,sd <Cmd>lua vim.diagnostic.open_float()
nnoremap <buffer> <silent> K <Cmd>lua vim.lsp.buf.hover()
xnoremap <buffer> <silent> af <Cmd>lua require'nvim-treesitter.textobjects.select'.select_textobject('@function.outer','textobjects','x')
onoremap <buffer> <silent> af <Cmd>lua require'nvim-treesitter.textobjects.select'.select_textobject('@function.outer','textobjects','o')
nnoremap <buffer> <silent> goc <Cmd>lua vim.lsp.buf.outgoing_calls()
nnoremap <buffer> <silent> gi <Cmd>lua vim.lsp.buf.implementation()
nnoremap <buffer> <silent> gd <Cmd>lua vim.lsp.buf.definition()
nnoremap <buffer> <silent> gD <Cmd>lua vim.lsp.buf.declaration()
nnoremap <buffer> <silent> gr :lua require'nvim-treesitter-refactor.smart_rename'.smart_rename(23)
xnoremap <buffer> <silent> if <Cmd>lua require'nvim-treesitter.textobjects.select'.select_textobject('@function.inner','textobjects','x')
onoremap <buffer> <silent> if <Cmd>lua require'nvim-treesitter.textobjects.select'.select_textobject('@function.inner','textobjects','o')
nnoremap <buffer> <silent> <C-]> <Cmd>lua vim.lsp.buf.definition()
inoremap <buffer> <silent> ,ca <Cmd>lua vim.lsp.buf.code_action()
let &cpo=s:cpo_save
unlet s:cpo_save

setlocal winbar=\ %#DevIconLua#%#Normal#\ %t%m%=%#GitSignsAdd#261%#Normal#\ %=%c\ %l/%L
setlocal winblend=0
setlocal winhighlight=
setlocal nowinfixheight
setlocal nowinfixwidth
setlocal nowrap
setlocal wrapmargin=0
silent! normal! zE
let &fdl = &fdl
let s:l = 12 - ((11 * winheight(0) + 32) / 65)
if s:l < 1 | let s:l = 1 | endif
keepjumps exe s:l
normal! zt
keepjumps 12
normal! 013|
wincmd w
argglobal
if bufexists(fnamemodify("~/code/github/minimal-statusline.nvim/lua/minimal-statusline/utils.lua", ":p")) | buffer ~/code/github/minimal-statusline.nvim/lua/minimal-statusline/utils.lua | else | edit ~/code/github/minimal-statusline.nvim/lua/minimal-statusline/utils.lua | endif
if &buftype ==# 'terminal'
  silent file ~/code/github/minimal-statusline.nvim/lua/minimal-statusline/utils.lua
endif

normal! zt

normal! 011|

exe 'vert 1resize ' . ((&columns * 85 + 128) / 256)
exe 'vert 2resize ' . ((&columns * 84 + 128) / 256)
exe '3resize ' . ((&lines * 33 + 34) / 68)

exe '4resize ' . ((&lines * 32 + 34) / 68)
exe 'vert 4resize ' . ((&columns * 85 + 128) / 256)
tabnext
edit ~/code/github/minimal-statusline.nvim/lua/minimal-statusline/init.lua

let s:save_splitright = &splitright
set splitbelow splitright
wincmd _ | wincmd |
vsplit

wincmd w

let &splitright = s:save_splitright

let s:save_winminwidth = &winminwidth

set winminwidth=0

exe 'vert 2resize ' . ((&columns * 128 + 128) / 256)

if exists('s:wipebuf') && len(win_findbuf(s:wipebuf)) == 0 && getbufvar(s:wipebuf, '&buftype') isnot# 'terminal'

endif

if filereadable(s:sx)
  exe "source " . fnameescape(s:sx)
endif

set hlsearch
doautoall SessionLoadPost
unlet SessionLoad
